rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: The ship sailed smoothly., word: smoothly
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single word, 'RB', which is a valid part-of-speech tag listed in the provided description. The description explicitly states that the chatbot should return only the part-of-speech tag. Therefore, the output complies with the requirements outlined in the description.
OK
